narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Providence Care INC is a Nursing Care provider based in Riverdale, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.2M in Medicaid payments across 25K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
